bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zhu chuang zhong feng 諸瘡中風 , wind stroke via all possible sores. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 治破傷風腫方 , “Recipe to cure wound wind with swelling ”. Po shang shi 破傷濕 , wounds harmed by moisture [4]

Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Abbreviated Designation shang shi 傷濕 . Pathological Condition of lockjaw and rigidity brought forth by the impact of water/moisture on an open wound. Similar to po shang feng 破傷風 , wound wind. San yin ji yi bing zheng fang lun 三因極一病證方論 7: 瘡瘍未合，風入，為破傷風；濕入，為破傷濕。二者害人最急 , “If wind enters sores and ulcers that have not closed yet, this results in wound wind. If moisture enters, the result is wounds harmed by moisture . Both types of harm are extremely serious for a person”.
